# Axis

> A modern, cross-platform Git GUI built with Tauri, React, and Rust.

Axis is a desktop application for managing Git repositories with a visual interface. It runs on Windows, macOS, and Linux.

## Key Features

- **Staging & Commits**: Stage files, chunks, or individual lines. AI-assisted commit messages.
- **Branches**: Create, rename, delete, compare branches. Visual branch graph.
- **Merging & Rebasing**: Merge, rebase, interactive rebase with conflict resolution.
- **Cherry Pick**: Apply commits from other branches.
- **Stashing**: Save and restore work in progress.
- **History & Blame**: Browse commit history, view file blame, search commits.
- **GitHub Integration**: View PRs, issues, CI status, notifications.
- **SSH Keys**: Generate, import, export SSH keys without terminal.
- **Commit Signing**: GPG and SSH signature support.
- **Git Hooks**: Manage and edit repository hooks.
- **Reflog**: Browse and recover from reference log.
- **Bisect**: Binary search for bugs.
- **Worktrees**: Manage multiple working directories.
- **Submodules**: Add, update, remove submodules.
- **Git LFS**: Large file storage support.
- **GitFlow**: GitFlow workflow support.
- **Custom Actions**: User-defined shell commands with keyboard shortcuts.

## Technology Stack

- **Frontend**: React, TypeScript, Zustand, TailwindCSS
- **Backend**: Rust, Tauri, git2-rs
- **Build**: Vite, pnpm

## Links

- Website: https://axis-git.app
- Documentation: https://axis-git.app/guide/
- GitHub: https://github.com/Choochmeque/Axis
- License: MIT

## Documentation Structure

- /guide/ - Getting started and overview
- /guide/installation - Installation instructions
- /guide/staging-commits - Staging and committing changes
- /guide/branches - Branch management
- /guide/merging-rebasing - Merging and rebasing
- /guide/cherry-pick - Cherry picking commits
- /guide/stashing - Stash management
- /guide/history-blame - History browsing and blame
- /guide/github-integration - GitHub features
- /guide/ai-commits - AI-assisted commit messages
- /guide/git-hooks - Git hooks management
- /guide/reflog - Reference log
- /guide/bisect - Git bisect
- /guide/worktrees - Worktrees
- /guide/submodules - Submodules
- /guide/git-lfs - Large file storage
- /guide/gitflow - GitFlow workflow
- /guide/custom-actions - Custom shell actions
- /guide/keyboard-shortcuts - Keyboard shortcuts
- /guide/ssh-keys - SSH key management
- /guide/commit-signing - Commit signing
- /guide/settings - Application settings
